content: Initially very good but after playing for an hour or so it stops opening and you have to delete and reload app to regain access losing all the progress you had made

The game is SOOOOO RIGGED on campaign mode... It's kind of ridiculous. You get passed the first (intermediate) levels in a breeze but then the later (hard) levels are quite frankly impossible to beat. The AI gets all of the good cards EVERY. SINGLE. DRAW.
App has stopped working. Crashes on opening of app. It used to be a great app though!
Game keeps crashing. Played fine for 12 hours. Now says it was designed for an older version of android and crashes.

Love the game, feel like it adapts well to mobile (have played IRL for awhile now) but as of a few days ago I have been ridden with a bug that forces a crash and is not fixed on phone restart or force stopping the app. It's a great game otherwise but this bug is rendering the game literally unplayable. Dunno what's going on but there's no way for me to get any other troubleshooting feedback.
Cool little campaign mode.. good tutorial... fun graphics/music. And obviously the actual game of Jaipur is awesome. easy 5-stars
Crashes until you reinstall, all progress lost. Real shame as enjoy the game.
Why I have to buy same game multiple times
Terrible app, keeps on crashing. Even after multiple reports there is no fix from developers

Great game, love the AI because hard means hard! It can be beaten, but you have to watch the strategy very hard and get lucky with your cards too. However, the game has constantly crashed half way through playing. If this is fixed I will then leave 5 stars. Please fix its very frustrating.
Excellent physical card game but the app needs work and updates. Crashed and never started after that initial crash, had to reinstall, all saves were lost.
Little glitchy on occasion, great game.
This is such a good game, I play with my girlfriend online or in the same room
Crashes on start up.

The game is fun at the lower levels in campaign mode. Later on it is very apparent it is rigged towards the computer winning, which makes the game a lot less enjoyable. Setting up an account to play with your friends is also impossible; it constantly says there is an error when entering your email address. If looking to play with your friends, find a different game. Samsung S9+
The pass and play is constantly crushing. Developers, please fix it! 8 out of 12 games we played have crushed on us, which was very disappointing, because the game looks very polished.
Easy game to understand and teach.

Good game but bad permissions. I like this game! I wish there were more people to play against online. I'm giving it 3 stars now because I don't agree to these new Google terms. They took our money and now suddenly pop up with new terms that we have to agree to for a purchase I made over a year ago, or I can't play with the product I already bought? Like this other Hannah reviewer said, refunds should be offered. Google is getting too weird with this stuff.
Quite fun and addictive with beautiful graphics, smooth interface, and fun campaigns. Excellent digital adaptation of a great card game.

I had the card version of this game and loved it, so I decided to install this online version. I had it a few months and everything was good and working fine, but then for no reason at all it wouldn't let me open the app at all. I tried several times over a period of a few weeks and still no joy. I also sent multiple pieces of feedback. I have no idea if they were viewed but nothing was done to resolve the bug. DO NOT INSTALL!!

I love this game. I had it on a previous phone. When I went to reinstall it, it said it needed permission to see if I was on a phone and who was calling. Erm, no. So I haven't reinstalled it because I'm not happy do give permission for that. Perhaps I could have my money back, or you could release a version without demanding unnecessary permissions? No other game needs that.
Great app and great game - nicely done

Excellent adaption of the original game. The campaign mode and the variety of playing options e.g. limiting what goods are available to sell or reversing the value of goods keeps game play interesting since you need to adapt your strategy accordingly

The game design is very cool..but the reason i don't give 5 stars is that after you complete half the map the game gets crazy difficult. And one more thing...with already 7 cards in my hand i can't trade with the cards in the market....but the opponent can. Not fair guys..not fair.
Ok
Fails during license check even after repeated reinstalls from Play Store. Error message recommends an "internet connexion"
Pass and play keeps crashing as of recently and we can't recover the game. This game is really enjoyable so it's disappointing when this happens over and over :(
It's good. Just like the card game
Crashes every time i fire it up. Used to work fine.
Good game. Not many players online, but I'd imagine they're running into similar difficulties I've found. This game crashes fairly often during online play. Not fun.
I love this game. But I beat the AI on its hardest setting in a few hours on my first time playing. Please figure out a way to increase the difficulty.
Bug won't let me play the campaign

Single player is great, so is the campaign mode. But pass and play is broken. It keeps crashing when passing so far into a game. Also we have to hold the phone at a ridiculous angle to be able to see the cards.
Can't install since I rooted my device. Unacceptable policy.
This is an awesome addicting game. Its clever yet simple, and goes quick. The app has run smooth for me.
Simple card game, easy to understand and quick to play, enjoying it so far.
Screen width issues on tablet. The number of cards is not visible fully. It works fine on phone.
Love this game

Game is very interesting but it gets disconnected frequently while playing online version of it. After killing the app and connecting it again , it still shows multiple presence of mine in game. I can share screenshots for that
Needs updating. Cant even sign in. Password field doesn't work. Asmodee, fix your apps bro.
I love this game but what happens when you complete all the regions? It would be nice if there were more regions to complete

Fun and rather eatsy to learn card game with much more strategic depth than what it may seem at first. As a merchant, you have to buy, sell and exchange goods keeping always an eye on your opponent moves. Delightful graphics, nice ambience music, and challenging solo (vs AI) and campaign modes. Unfortunately if you are into playing against other people you won't find many these days. Nevertheless, the game but itself is more than worth it
Game crashes during pass and play, please fix this as it would otherwise be a great game!
Soo god love it

Edit: problem with pass and play option. Cannot change out multiple cards from the area and camels as well as cards from my hand. Example: I want to take three leather and replace two camels and one tea from my hand and it will not let me. Will change review back if fixed. Thanks a lot great app otherwise. Great game. Many hours played and great strategy. Ai is good as well

The game itself gets 5 stars but the app is terrible. Worked great for a week and then randomly wont open at all. It just gives the message "jaipur stopped working". It's been like that for a few weeks.
Excellent App! I wish more board game implementations were like this implementation.

It cheats! I own the physical game and love it. Me and wife play it all the time. Thought I'd try the app and although it looks and plays great, the game cheats you. The draws a massively and consistently favourable to the AI.
It's great fun, well ported to a phone. Unfortunately on my pixel 3 XL the game is slightly zoomed in and therefore I can't see the whole game.
This is a very fun game that is easy to learn and has a high replay value. App works well. There are no ads or in-app purchases!!!
It says my license is invalid
App wants ability to make phone calls.
Will not launch. After the first loading screen upon launch I get an error with multiple spelling errors about the license being invalid. I have attempted to contact support twice with no response.

License check problem. My device is completely connect to the internet on my own data plan but the game keep asking me for the "connexion" to check its license. I still can't play this game since I buy it.
Great game but please update the game to fit the screen size of newer phones.

It keeps saying my phone needed internet ‚Äùconnexion" (lol the typo) to check the license and just quit even though I'm already connected (tested with 2 different wifis just to be sure). A shame since I heard great things about the game.
Lots of fun. Have the original and enjoy playing it if my partner is busy.
Great game.
It crashes a lot, fix it
Online keeps crashing. Ridiculously bad. Gameplay is otherwise great.
Keeps crashing and I loose all my campaign progress everytime I reinstall the game.
Worked for 3 days then stopped. Sent feedback but got no response. Either fix it or give me a refund

What otherwise could be a fantastic implementation of this game is greatly impacted by one incorrectly coded rule. When the players hand is full, they are prohibited from making a swap with the market (as they should be according to rules). This is exacerbated by the fact the AI is able to do this. As others have mentioned, this one bug leads to a major bias against the player which becomes flagrant as you progress to expert difficulty. Have to believe this change would take < 15 mins in code.
Great game! Could be resized to better fit Pixel 4XL, but other than that, this is still an incredibly fun game!
Why does the app need access to my photos and media and phone ID and history. What relationship does it have to the game whatsoever. I actually paid for the whole game. This is very upsetting.
Good but can be improved as there is a glitch that means when you have a full hand you cannot exchange cards from the market (but the AI can.)
It would be a great game of it didn't keep crashing; it worked perfectly for weeks.
Was a fabulous game till it started crashing with the latest android update. The app should be updated to work with the latest android release or be withdrawn from Play Store.

Very nice game, but the pass-and-play controls, which make you hide your cards by tilting the device, don't quite improve this game. For one thing, it assumes that players are sitting across from one another (not relevant in car/plane scenario), and the tilting really takes the non-acting player out of the game. Since the quick turns really make this game flow, I'd like to request a feature where players can simply hold their hand to show them or even just play open-handed to play casually.

I'm loving it so far. I like the campaign a lot. The different rules in different destinations make it interesting and fun. I also like the building element. I'm nearly through the campaign already, and I worry I might tire of the game. It might be a good idea to have multiple campaigns, or just an additional one? Initially, I was unable to create an account, but I went to the asmodee website and made one there. However, there are few people in the online duel, but that's to be expected.

I love Jaipur. I own a physical copy of it. The multiplayer needs to be worked on. A friend and I play long distance, and our games always time out. I also wish there was a bit more customization in making online matches, like being able to turn the timer off... If these issues were fixed, I'd be more apt to give a higher rating.

Have bought this twice, but it won't open. I get the "Unfortunately Jaipur has stopped" message every time. Even after uninstalling, refunding and rebuying. Second refund imminent. *** Still not working and second refund is apparently not imminent. How do I get the second purchase refunded please? I've spent an hour trying to get this to work and I'm ready to give up. ***
Looks like a great digital version of this game but a fairly large portion of the screen was cut off due to a screen sizing issue on my device. Sadly I exercised my right to a refund.
Fun, but it crashes when you minimize the game during a round. Only clearing the data or full reinstall fixes the issue, leading to campaign progress lost! Which is quite frustrating.

game crashes when you trade a camel card and an in-hand card. It's an action described in the tutorial and works there but not in the actual game. In 1hr of playing I've 4 crashes. great fun!! refunded game. Android user. Total shame as it's a really fun game!
Great game, but really buggy. Feel into a crash loop and customer supports only solution was a full reinstall. Lost all my progress to get half way through the campaign and have it happen again...

I love this game. Really fun to play even against the AI. Learning curve is small. Loved the campaign as well, although after completing the campaign I don't play it much. An offline two player game over wi-fi/bluetooth with a friend would be great. In the Pass n Play mode please let us play different game modes like rising prices etc.
nice version of rhe boardgame
The screen gets cut off for me and makes it hard for me to tell how much money I have and is also very annoying
game doesn't resize properly to fit on my phone's screen. text and graphics are cut off. refund didn't go through. avoid like the plague.
I have the cards too, but the game cheats! It tends to put 1 card down which is not permitted. So it's a little frustrating at times.

when playing the computer, there is a serious bug - with 7 cards in hand the computer can still exchange cards from the market whereas the player (i) cannot. this results in a heavy winning bias for the computer. please fix this asap as there is no point playing the computer with this huge bias, solo functionality is useless for now.

Beautiful game, but unstable. It's a great adaptation of a great card game. The art is beautiful and the controls intuitive. The problem is that the game eventually stops working (happened on both Moto Z Play and Moto Z3), and requires a full reinstall, at which point you lose all progress and additional game modes.
Love this game. When first released, it crashed. often but now it is smooth as purple silk.
replyContent:
Hello Jonas, 

We are deeply sorry about this. 
Could you please contact the support: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

Best regards, 
Asmodee Digital support

content: Addictive. So much fun. Good blend of strategy and luck üëç
improved version of a classic 2 player game.
replyContent:
Hello, 

Thanks for your feedback, 
Our team work on this and this should be solved in the next update. 

Best regards,

content: Light but deep card game, full of risks, luck and some strategy! I'm so addicted now that I've ordered a physical copy.
Suddenly will no longer load. immediately crashes.

the game keep closing. and like that for few day. and i try to uninstall. and it seem i could not re-installed it from google play since it is no selection to install. what a scam. i already paid for this

content: Swift easy to use good interface. Good board game implementation on LG V30 7.1.2

Paid for the app. Worked fine until it stopped. The hard levels are extremely hard and cannot help but feel there is a bias towards the AI. That, I guess is the limitation of playing a chance game against a computer.
on Nokia 6.1 the game doesn't fit on the screen and some buttons are not available so I can't play with it
replyContent:
Hi Norbert Kerti , thank you for your feedback and sorry about this issue with Jaipur. Please contact support here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/?fbclid=IwAR1Q_44ZAO-xaqnfbBP1v2a11KUUNX8Gqnu85BzySMZIoQCD2VpB_DBsEn4&p=android

content: Great game. Addictive gameplay. One HUGE problem though...it is "not compatible" with my Motorola Nexus 6 (maybe because it's rooted, but every other Asmodee game works fine). It works perfectly on my Chromebook, but not on the Nexus 6. Please fix this because this would be a great game to play on it.

I'm really liking this game so far but it's really frustrating that the computer can make a move by exchanging cards when it's hand is full, but I can't???!! I've never played the physical game but i have to assume something is wrong here. fix it or the game is useless, what makes games fun is when there is a level playing field and you actually feel like you're actions are making the difference. when the other player has a massive advantage like that then it feels completely pointless.
The game is fun but completely stopped working after I played a few times. Won't even start now.
replyContent:
Hi Neeta Mohite , thank you for your feedback and sorry about this issue with XXX . Please contact support here and give information about the game, your device and the software version:

Best regards, Asmodee Digital team.

content: Cannot see score while playing on Google Pixel.
Pick up and play, super easy to get into. Not much of a barrier either and not a time-sink. Love love it.
I love this game, but it recently started crashing so I can no longer play. I hope the next update fixes it!

The interface and game play are great but the AI is not only cheap but opportunistic almost all the time. It "conveniently" gets high value cards or the ability to end the game right before you can sell a good amount. Wish this would be fixed. As its drawn me away from playing it much these days
Online account keeps logging out and forgetting my password. Using galaxy s7. So sad, it's a great app but I cant reliably play with my friends.
replyContent:
Hi Brian, thank you for your feedback. We are sorry for the issues you're encountering with Isle If Skye. in order to help us fix those bugs, can you please contact support here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/?fbclid=IwAR1Q_44ZAO-xaqnfbBP1v2a11KUUNX8Gqnu85BzySMZIoQCD2VpB_DBsEn4

content: Love this game.. Buying the physical version to play with partner though, this app loses connection two much when we play online together.

Developer has a habit of continually adding new permissions, always without any explanation or even mentioning them. Trying to get an explanation via email is like pulling teeth, taking several months of back and forth just to get a BS, half-@$$ed answer that only shows they either have no clue what they're talking about or they're lying, neither of which is something I want from the developer of an app I use only my phone.
Great implementation of the boardgame, but the graphics suffer from scaling issues that push text boxes off the screen.
Keeps crashing upon starting. Developer hasn't bothered to investigate for 3 months.
The game has stopped working completely. Complained so many times but no response.
replyContent:

We are deeply sorry about this, could you please contact the support: 
https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

best regards, 
Asmodee Digital support

content: I dont know why people are giving so much negating feedback. Obviously the campaign mode does not mean anything to me, but the overall implementation is really nice. But I am not sure if the card deck is totally random for the higher level AIs or it cheats.
Love it. Responsive developers.
Good fun for kids and adults.
replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback, we are really pleased you are enjoying the game!

Best regards,
Asmodee Digital support

content:
Would have rated much better, at least 4 Stars, if the AI in the Hard Mode 
of the Campaign did not take such a long time. It is like you are playing 
against another human. This makes an exciting game boring. Hope the 
Development Team notices this issue and fixes it at the earliest.

content:
The card game is pretty cool but the technical implementation is really 
bad. The game crashes quite often and there is nothing more infuriating 
than loosing your pass and play game to bad coding. Don't buy this game. 
Not even on sale.
replyContent:
Hello, 

We are deeply sorry about this.
Could you please contact the support:https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

content:
Was working great - some mistakes when trying to exchange cards as the 
controls aren't too easy and I'd select new cards accidentally. Now I can't 
open the game, it crashes on launch. I can only think to uninstall and 
re-install but then I'm going to lose my campaign provreds

Beat Jaipur region in 82 days. Doesn't seem to be much point to campaign 
mode after that. Cannot play online because text boxes don't display typed 
characters until a space or @ or . which makes entering a password doubly 
difficult. Like faithful dog I first went to helpshift as noted in several 
comments but after typing out the issue in detail I could not get the form 
to submit on mobile. Samsung note 8 with default Samsung keyboard.

Game has been great but it is now not working. Unable to open app and it 
keeps force stopping it. Uninstalled it and reinstalled but made no 
difference!

Game has a tendency to crash, causing you to restart the campaign. Also, 
the developers should definitely add a statistics page of games won/lost 
against AI and against online players for any role variation.

The only thing stopping me from giving a higher rating is that campaign 
mode doesn't sync between my tablet and my phone using the Asmodee cloud 
account. This should be seen as an essential feature, and I question why 
the cloud account even exists if this doesn't work.
Sorry, tell me please how can I exit from game. I can not find button "Exit" or "Close" on main menu screen.  Thanks!

Not only does the AI repeatedly take the most valuable cards, but it's able 
to make a move that a human player can't: exchange 1 card when the hand is 
full. Very frustrating to play against a loaded game.
replyContent:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback, we're sorry about this.
In order for us to improve the game and help you, could you please contact our support team on this platform: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/
Best regards,

Asmodee Customer Support

Love it, but I have to uninstall, then reinstall it every month or so

content:
On 2 different phones of mine the app cache has become corrupted and you 
can no longer open the app. The only way to fix the problem is to reinstall 
the game (which clears the cache) but then you lose all your progress, 
despite having an account. Come on guys you really need to fix this!
Great game

Great interface and implementation of an equally great game. I am FAIRLY 
certain the AI cheats on harder difficulties though, which can be 
frustrating. If this is the case, it'd be nice if the devs would 
acknowledge it.
I love this game.. I have the board game and this mobile app version is a great adaptation! Recommended.
Well it was a 5 star for me until Android 8 aka Oreo was pushed to my phone, now the app crashes. How soon until you fix this?
replyContent:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback, we're sorry about this.
In order for us to improve the game and help you, could you please contact our support team on this platform: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

Asmodee Customer Support

content: My wife and I really love this game, the pass and play functionality is the best I've ever seen. I only wish you guys had a-synchronous play like words with friends
Can't play, crashes on opening with mi5

I'm really addicted to this game. It's a fun and challenging two-player trading game. Campaign mode is a neat way of experimenting with the rules options of the game, which puts a challenging twist on it that keeps me playing. Campaign mode also adds a bit of story for flavor. I liked the app so much, I purchased the physical game, and enjoy playing that, too. Great fun and highly recommended.
The app crashed and I couldn't open it, so I had to reinstall it and I lost all my progress. Very disappointing for a non free game.

I love the real version of the game but this app is disappointing. The animations are annoying, the controls are lackluster and how is there no statistics? As in games played and won, etc... Seems like a basic feature.
App won't open and there is no fix.
replyContent:
Hello, 

We are sorry about this. 
Could you please contact the support to find a solution: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

Best regards, 
Asmodee Digital support

content: I love this game, and this *was* a great implementation of it. Unfortunately, the app has a tendency to develop cache errors, and the only way to resolve is to clear the cache. Progress is not linked to your account, so you lose all campaign progress when this happens. It's happened to me twice now.
replyContent:
Hello, 

We are sorry about this. 
Our team is working on this. 
Don't hesitate to contact the support: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

Best regards, 
Asmodee Digital support

content: Great game, ready to learn and fun single player campaign.  Minus one start because ai takes a really long time to think about it's move.

The campaign is rigged and the AI is almost invincible for the last 8 of 9 regions. Not sure why developers do this, it is not an easy game, and would have been just as good if a player would finish it.
This app is an awesome implementation of the best 2 player game ever!
Great game, fun implementation.  Unfortunately since the last update it crashes every time I open.
Barely anyone online. Sometimes crashes online. Waiting for opponent and hourglass keeps turning. Sometimes problem with changing card selection.
Super addictive
Fun game, Computer player takes too long to take their turn though.
This game has a very amazing implementation of the board game. Its simple and very easy to play. The app also offers campaign mode and the Ai is very challenging.

A great game that sadly has an odd bug in the campaign. The computer for some reason can exchange none camel cards from hand for cards in the market area. Something which is completely against the game rules. This does make for frustrating games.  Aside from this it a good purchase for those who are either a fan of the game, or thinking of trying this before buying the physical game.
Another very competent port. The campaign helps give it legs.

My husband and I play the card game regularly and this is a well done substitute when we're traveling. One fix would be really nice. In pass and play, if the other player has not yet begun their turn, the current player should have a reset/back button in case a mistake is made.
Jaipur is a great card game and this digital versions is spot on.

Was great until it bugged and crashed repeatedly showing rhe same screen for a second. Tried to force close, restart, clear cache. Finally reinstalled to find that I lost all campaign progress that I was almost done with
Campaign has multiple bugs.  Can't click on a region after completing a region.  I have to go to another menu and then return.

The best thing is the campaign a great feature. The most disappointing fact about it is that it take a super long time for the AI to make a turn, making the game so long and boring that one cannot enjoy its full potential. I hope it could work faster.
I really like this game. Great gameplay. I will really loved more levels and more ways to upgrade the campaign mode.

Rigged. Not only is the AI allowed to make plays that you can't but some levels in the campaign mode are impossible to complete. I'm not talking just hard but mathematically impossible. For example, Karauli, the AI *always* wins every round DESPITE only acquiring the lower level chips. I've actually done the math on paper as I play and there is no way the AI can acquire such a high score.
replyContent:
Hello, 
This is strange, a lot of people complete the campaign and we do not succeed to reproduce the "math" issue. Could you please contact us to speak about this: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/
Best regards,

content: The game crashes before even booting up.  Never got to play it.
Never played the physical game, but I'm really enjoying it just vs the AI. Implementation of pass-and-play is very clever and works well.

Game is good to sharpen your skills against the AI.  Like the campaign variant and differing goods values. However I originally had a major flaw with game which now seems to work. The flaw was that players could not exchange cards when they had seven-in-hand unlike the AI which could. Had no alternative but to sell cards from the hand, but thankfully this is no longer the case, the game now seems to be in full working order.  Excellent card game app - although personally I prefer the actual card game - although a 2 player game, it can be adjusted for 3-4 players...

Game is great. Graphics are alright. Campaign seems to be nice, though i'm still at the beggining. Problem lies on online mode. The absence of a friends list in such a game nowadays is unforgivable. Purchased the game with a friend and up to now I haven' t been able to set a game with him. Invitations frequently fail or the app crashes. All the online games I managed to play with other players handle me an error when the last chip of the match is delivered, so I never know who won the match. The time limit to play could be optional. If anything happens in my turn which diverts me from the game, its lost. That's kind of frustrating. Game is fine and could be 5 stars if not for those Online issues.

Intensity ranges from relaxing to mentally challenging. Good design, friendly interface, background noise simulation of a busy street are great...but the game cheats when the computer bot draws an extra card without having camel cards for equal trade. For example, when the computer has Zero camels, the computer for some reason is able to draw two cards. Why can't I do the same? Why pay for a game when it's unfair? Poor execution by the developers. Game was not tested by the developers. If you read other reviews about card draw fairness, the developers don't reply to them. Shady.
Much like the physical version, good game
Generally very good but crashed during pass & play.
Won't open and just crashes. So far very disappointed.
There is a problem with the rules on the player side. Can't exchange cards when 7 in hand, but the computer can.
Tutorial worked fine .Have tried pass and play  twice. Has crashed twice. Big fan of your other apps and of the card version. Crash occurs when exchanging camels

Game is great, but it seems the player is hampered in a way that they shouldn't. When I have seven cards I should be able to exchange an equal amount from my hand with the board, but I can't and am forced to sell. On higher difficulties the AI will exchange alerter reaching a seven card hand all the time, so it puts the player at a bit of a disadvantage.
Excellent game. The rule variations keep it fresh. One negative is the inability to choose rule variations in pass and play mode. Other than that, perfect game.
Never played the physical game, but I like this
Could be 5 stars with improvements to AI; it is either to easy or too difficult. The harder AI simply is always given the best cards, making it impossible to win.
the game doesnt make save for pass and play games, is this intended? because i mainly use this for pass and play
Multiplay suuuuper buggy.
Nice port of the card game. Hoping to see a system implemented where you can save and invite friends to play much like Words with Friends.
I love Jaipur, but the app crashes on loading. I had this problem before, and eventually, an update was released to fix it. This time, it's been a few weeks, and...nothing. Still crashing on loading.

content: Wanted to try it out before diving in to the physical version. Excellent game.
A great adaptation of an awesome game only let down by the shockingly poor AI.

Great implementation of the board game. I hardly use the cardboard version anymore as this enables us to play many more games for the same time by doing away with the boards setup and the card/token shuffling and management.  My only problem is with the 1 minute timeout in online multiplayer mode. It should be optional or at least adjustable. It terminated many games I was attempting to play with slower players and I stopped using this mode. It is a pity because the online mode is more convenient than the "play and pass" mode for local games as each payer can have their own tablet and it speeds things up even more. It would be easy to change in an update. PLEASE DO SO ASMODEE.
replyContent:
Hello, 

Thanks for all your feedbacks, we forward them to the team. 
Don't hesitate to contact the support: 
https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

best regards,

content: A good adapatation but a bit buggy. Otherwise, it is quite a fun game.

content: I love this digital adaptation of the card game Jaipur. Wonderfully done and allows me to play by myself when it and about. My only desire would be the ability to save the game. Sometimes I start a multiple round game and run out of time to finish it, would love to be able to save and pick up where I left off later. This would be great in the campaign and normal play mode. And if you love the app pick up the real card game is based on, one of the best to player games ever!
Tis is awsome watch generikb he is cool on it.

The AI in the campaign take forever to figure out their move, I could almost take a nap. And it loses some of my progress in the campaign.  Not very cool for a pretty fun game, makes it almost not worth playing,  too bad i paid for this
replyContent:
Hi Sara,

We are working hard on this issue. The next version should improve the time the AI takes to play and will include an offline progression save feature. So in solo mode or campaign mode, your progress will be saved if you quit the game.

Please wait a few more days to get this new update and I'm sure you'll have less issues.

Best regards,

Thanks again.
Best regards,

content: This is an excellent adaptation of one of the best quick play card games. Thankful for the campaign mode as it's quite addictive. My only complaint is that the bottom of the screen, which shows your score, is cut off on a Nexus 7 tablet. Tends to also run quite hot.
Low resolution text/graphics.
replyContent:

Sorry for this but we can not optimize it for now as the app is already quite heavy (around 250Mb).

Thank your for your feedback.

Best,
The Asmodee Digital Support team

content: If you're looking to play multiplayer, forget it.  A strict 30 second turn timer for multiplayer which is not configurable and kicks you out of the game when it expires? Are you kidding me? Not to mention that the other player is not informed that you've been booted and they're now playing AI. I've been playing with someone and have had my game freeze while the other player begins playing AI without any prompt. This is absolutely abysmal and is not at all ready to sell.     Note: "we _may_ add some custom time limits in the next versions" is not good enough.
replyContent:
Thanks Jonathon for your feedback. 
We are working on a new update to give more options to users about this timer. 30sec seems to be not enough.

Best,
The Asmodee Digital support team

content: Fantastic adaptation of the game.

Great adaptation of an engaging card game. The cards look detailed,  the campaign is a nice bonus and the pass and play features a clever mechanic. Cards of one player are only revealed to him if the phone is tilted to his direction and if the phone is flat then no cards are revealed at all! I just hope that it can show the total tokens as well.
replyContent:
Hi Jamilson,
You can see the total tokens available if you do a long press/tap on the tokens in the left panel of the screen. Tokens will zoom and you will be able to count them.

Please contact us anytime for a dedicated answer at: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/jaipur/

Best,
The Asmodee Digital Tech Support

content: This is a great adaptation of a favorite quick two player game.  AI play is satisfying, the campaign option is fun for solo play.  Overall the artwork is well done and clean, without bogging down the game. The downside comes from my most anticipated mode: online dual.  The makers are going in the right direction by supporting cross platform play, but the only option for play is real time.  This means that if myself and a friend aren't in the lobby at the same time, we cannot start a game.  Once we do get a game going, if I do something else for more than 30 seconds, I've forfeited the game.  Games like Star Realms are a constant on my phone as I can invite an offline friend and play our turns at our own pace (with a 48 hour cut off).  All in all this is a great start.  Aside from a few random crashes (to be expected with an initial release) , the game runs well and looks great.  Just add offline game invite and asynchronous play and this is 5 star material.
replyContent:
Hello, 

Thanks for your feedbacks!

content: It's good and has a great implementation, especially for pass abd play, however there are a few issues, firstly it crashed when trying to trade camels, secondly you can't see which tokens you've taken (that I've seen anyway)

content: Love the campaign mode!
Great tutorial, fun quick-play game, with lush graphics and terrific UI. This is on par with the great version they made of SPLENDOR and of MYSTERIUM.

Great adaptation of the card game. The controls and visuals are very good! Works great online and local. The campaign mode also is very nice with a map and stuff to unlock!!! Very happy that I can now play this game on my tablet.
Colour me impressed! Very well done, beautiful new art and a great solo campaign mode.. Love it!
An excellent app adaptation of a great game!
